actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Space Science Applications.

official_title: A joint resolution debarring Morton Thiokol Inc.  from contracting and subcontracting with NASA until a determination is made by the Comptroller General with respect to actions which were allegedly taken by such corporation against its employees because they gave certain information to the Presidential Commission on the Space Shuttle Challenger Accident.

summary.text: Debars Morton Thiokol Inc. from contracting and subcontracting with the National Aeronautics and Space Administration until a determination is made by the Comptroller General with respect to actions allegedly taken by such Corporation against its employees because they gave certain information to the Presidential Commission on the Space Shuttle Challenger Accident.

titles.title: A joint resolution debarring Morton Thiokol Inc.  from contracting and subcontracting with NASA until a determination is made by the Comptroller General with respect to actions which were allegedly taken by such corporation against its employees because they gave certain information to the Presidential Commission on the Space Shuttle Challenger Accident.
